pages.text: $(li)The Truffle is an eatable item that can be used to craft a $(l)Truffle Crate$(), $(l)Truffle Mash$() and $(l)Truffle Pie$() in a $(l:patchouli:utility/vanilla/crafting_table)Crafting Table$(/l).$(br)$(li)This item can be used to brew a $(l:patchouli:potions/environmental/vitality)Potion of Vitaly$(/l) too.

$(li)When you give a $(l:patchouli:miscellaneous/vanilla/golden_carrot)Golden Carrot$(/l) to a $(l:patchouli:creatures/vanilla/pig)Pig$(/l), it will leads you to an specific spot.$(br)$(li)If you dig there, you will find a Truffle.
